post.body: If you are considering a 17" MacBook Pro, they were not refreshed with the last batch in the fall. Perhaps next wk at Macworld?
Man, sounds like an awesome way to ring in the New Year!
I used to use No Answer Transfer and forward my cell to a land line with voicemail until Visual Voicemail entered the picture.
Just like this!
Have a great birthday, Rob!
I am responsible for making the absolute worst 6-part cover of "Daydream Believer" ever on Wii Music. And yes, dog suit was used.
@windomearle is expecting a Flip Mino HD shortly via a US visitor. Will have to get a review of it from him.
I think the stars may align for such a visit. Just waiting for Christmas miracle (Ro napping) to end.
Another thumbs up vote for Zip. It curbed my impulsive purchases completely. On hiatus due to 2 year old sucking up free time.
Final score: Tree 1, Needles 3742
Fridge finally approaching nutritional equilibrium.
2008: the year my perception of time altered so much that months now pass by as fast as weeks used to.
NYT: Text Messaging "Virtually No Cost" to Carriers http://tinyurl.com/77wdne (RT via @consumerist)
Knead wrest.
Probably no boxing week sales out here. http://twitpic.com/xslz
Last night I dreamt I was a DJ and found no corelation between my love of music and entertaining other people.
Leftover leftovers.
is weening Rowan off raw sugar cane.
I am now officially a grandfather to a Webkinz lil' tree frog named Speckle.
No boxing day sales for me. Looking to pay top dollar for a new iMac in 9 days.
